name: ClassicalKINGChristmas
0:
”Alexa, open classical king christmas”
”Alexa, play classical king christmas”
”Alexa, ask classical king christmas to listen live”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: classical king christmas
des:
Bring the magic of the holiday season into your home with a selection of elegant, timeless classical music. Classical KING Christmas offers a grand and gorgeous soundtrack to elevate your festive celebrations. From beloved orchestral works to magnificent choral pieces, this is the ultimate listening experience for those who enjoy the refined beauty of classical music during the holidays.
How it works: Simply say, “Alexa, open Classical KING Christmas” or “Alexa, play Classical KING Christmas” to begin streaming a curated selection of classical Christmas music. Perfect for creating a majestic holiday atmosphere that’s both uplifting and serene.
Getting started:
1. Make sure you have an Alexa-enabled device, such as an Echo, Echo Dot, or any Alexa-compatible device.
2. Enable the skill by saying, “Alexa, enable Classical KING Christmas,” or by finding the skill in your Alexa app and tapping “Enable.”
3. Once enabled, just say, “Alexa, play Classical KING Christmas” to start enjoying the music.
No additional accounts or subscriptions are required—just you, your Alexa device, and the beautiful sound of classical Christmas music.
Fill your home with the splendor of classical holiday music, perfect for every moment of the season.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
